column14: DOCUMENTATION = How well are you documenting your work? Are your images diverse and clean?
column15: POSITIVE ATTITUDE = Are you being positive about trying new or challenging things?

column14: RESEARCH & PLANNING & SKETCHING = Are you researching ideas that have been discussed? Sketching notes? Planning next steps?
column15: EFFECTIVE USE OF TIME = Are you working during class? Are you taking advantage of this time to do things you can't do at home?
column16: Overall effort = assignments + effort and counts for 60% of your grade.

column14: RELECTION & OBSERVATION = Are you observing results and reflecting on outcomes?
column15: CURIOSITY = Are you interested and willing to try new things? Are you volunteering for opportunities to improve?

column14: CREATIVITY & EXPERIMENTATION = Are you trying different approaches? To make your ideas different than others around you?
column15: HELPFULNESS TO OTHERS = Are you helping your peers? Are you a distracting element when they are trying to work?

column14: WEBSITE = Is your website well organized, free of grammatical errors, easy to follow? Do you speak with confidence?
column15: CLEANLINESS = Do you clean up after yourself? Do you show care for the objects in the space and its organization?

column14: LINKS & REFERENCES = Are you providing links to your original design files? Where are your ideas are coming from?
column15: ATTENTIVENESS = Are you giving full attention when teacher or students are speaking , sharing information, or giving a presntation?

column14: 50% - Needs work   /   75% = Adequate   /   90 = Very Good   /   100 = Excellent
column15: 50% - Needs work   /   75% = Adequate   /   90 = Very Good   /   100 = Excellent
